title: 2011 Hyundai Equus Signature
notes: This video was a ton of fun to make. I experimented with using B-roll footage to compliment the vehicle, as well as to hide the vehicle leading up to the final full body beauty shot.  I experimented with using some of the vehicles automated features to help convey a better sense of motion to the shots beyond just the camera moving.  I experimented with performing a quick reverse backing away from the camera, then reversed the footage to make it appear as though the car was speeding towards the camera instead.  I experimented with filming from several new angles that I had not tried before including having the camera mounted to the top of the vehicle while it was in motion.

title: 2007 Toyota FJ Cruiser
notes: I experimented with a zoom in then out transiton for the video.

title: Wayne's Candied Apples
notes: I experimented with making one video that featured all the vehicles in inventory of a specific color.  I experimented with using more subtle information graphics to not pull attention away from the vehicles being showcased. I experimented with adding additional financing information in both English and Spanish instead of limiting it to just vehicle information. I also experimented with using animated graphics.

title: 2011 Ford F-150 SVT Raptor
notes: In this video I experimented with adjusting video speed and transitions to sync with audio cues from background music.  I also tested out the idea of using a 4wheeler during filming to help achieve a quick approach shot.

title: 2010 Lexus RX 450 Hybrid
notes: For this vehicle I tried using a single shot walk around followed by drastic zoom out.  I also experimented with driving shots looking out both the front windshield as well as the sunroof as it opened.

title: 2002 Lexus SC 430
notes: I experimented with revering and playing video in order to get convertible top to dance with background music.  I found that sometimes it's best to let the camera move and sometimes it's best to let the subject of the video move.

title: 2013 Ford F-150 SuperCrew
notes: I experimented with filming under the vehicle shots as I drove over the camera.  I experimented with filming the driver wheel while driving.  I experimented with using both softer and smoother as well as more abrupt transitions to help convey a sense of excitement and motion. I also experimented with having the vehicle pull the ending logo out of the background.

title: Wayne's Muscle Cars
notes: I experimented with not using music or information graphics but instead opted to record and edit my own audio so that I could let the vehicle engine sound itself speak to the potential new owners.

title: 2008 Hummer H3 Alpha
notes: I experimented with mounting the camera to the side of the vehicle to film the exterior while in motion.  I also experimented with the information graphics slightly trying to figure out a way to make them more appealing.

title: 2014 Lincoln Navigator L
notes: In this video I experimented with different opening titles, next to ground filming while in motion, animated information graphics and vehicle fly through shots. I also tried out the idea of incorporating polished mirrored surfaces as well as the surrounding foliage of plants to help showcase the beauty of the vehicle.

title: 2015 Lexus IS 250
notes: I experimented with using a reversed beauty shot as well as mirrored beginning and ending shots. I also used the open sunroof in order to film a bird's eye view of the driver portion of the passenger compartment.

title: 2012 Ford Mustang
notes: I expermineted with using a darker style of music to accentuate the vehicles aggressive beauty.  I also experimented with using multiple cameras in multiple angles that were later edited together to get a better depth to the video.

title: 2006 Ford F-150 SuperCrew
notes: This was a vehicle that was being used as a prize for a marketing contest that was being held. It was ultimately given to a customer who had been in dire need of a form of transportation for some time but had not had means to acquire one.  That same customer later went on to buy two additional vehicles for his wife and daughter.  A lasting business relationship was created that day.

title: 2012 Dodge Ram 1500
notes: I experimented with using cameras strapped to trees in order to create elevated footage of the vehicle.  I also experimented with less subtle transtions between video clips.

title: 2012 Toyota Tundra
notes: I experimented with using a lead vehicle to film the exterior of showcased vehicle while it was driving down the road.  I experimented with alternating the colors for the information graphics with the thought that it would help to keep the eye focused on the vehicleâ€™s noteworthy information.
